body_html:
@chenyuntc

There is no bug in Torch7, we should not change TH lib's source.


  ______             __   |  Torch7
 /_  __/__  ________/ /   |  Scientific computing for Lua.
  / / / _ \/ __/ __/ _ \  |  Type ? for help
 /_/  \___/_/  \__/_//_/  |  https://github.com/torch
                          |  http://torch.ch

th> require('torch');
                                                                      [0.0000s]
th> x = torch.rand(10, 10)
                                                                      [0.0001s]
th> y = x[{{},3}]
                                                                      [0.0001s]
th> torch.max(y,1)
 0.9540
[torch.DoubleTensor of size 1]

 7
[torch.LongTensor of size 1]

                                                                      [0.0004s]

body:
@chenyuntc 

There is no bug in Torch7, we should not change TH lib's source. 

```

  ______             __   |  Torch7
 /_  __/__  ________/ /   |  Scientific computing for Lua.
  / / / _ \/ __/ __/ _ \  |  Type ? for help
 /_/  \___/_/  \__/_//_/  |  https://github.com/torch
                          |  http://torch.ch

th> require('torch');
                                                                      [0.0000s]
th> x = torch.rand(10, 10)
                                                                      [0.0001s]
th> y = x[{{},3}]
                                                                      [0.0001s]
th> torch.max(y,1)
 0.9540
[torch.DoubleTensor of size 1]

 7
[torch.LongTensor of size 1]

                                                                      [0.0004s]
```
